Class CheckerPeriod

java.lang.Object
com.luchersol.core.util.AbstractChecker<Period,CheckerPeriod>
com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.CheckerPeriod
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceChecker<AbstractChecker<Period,CheckerPeriod>,Period>
public class CheckerPeriod extends AbstractChecker<Period,CheckerPeriod>
A specialized checker for Period instances, providing a fluent API to assert various temporal properties such as positivity, negativity, zero value, and comparisons with other periods or specific temporal units.

Typical usage:


 Period p1 = Period.ofMonths(6);
 Period p2 = Period.ofYears(1);

 CheckerPeriod.check(p1)
     .isPositive()
     .isLessThan(p2)
     .isGreaterOrEqualThan(Period.ofMonths(3));

This class supports chaining multiple assertions in a fluent style and integrates with AbstractChecker for generalized validation handling.

See Also:

  • AbstractChecker
